name: 蔡榮發
objective: 本課程旨在探討些最近發展之最佳化方法與應用，包含啟發式方法與確定性方法，本課程內容以確定性最佳化方法為主，如線性規劃、非線性規劃、整數規劃、分數規劃、目標規劃等，應用問題包括：原物料切割問題、投資組合問題、管理績效評估、多磁碟系統配置、能力集合分析等。試圖運用各種最佳化技術以最有效率方式求得全域最佳解。此外，相關之文獻及各種應用將深入討論。
schedule:
2/20 Introduction to global optimization
2/27 terminology (discrete, continuous, convex, concave, nonconvex, posynomial, polynomial, signomial, quadratic, quai-convex, separable program, fractional program, convex set etc.)
3/6, 3/13: Multidisk vertical allocation (Data knowledge and engineering, 1993, Chang, 2002, Tsai, 2005, New method) (testing problems and present report on 4/8) 
3/20, 3/27: Nonlinear programming problems (Approximate polynomial, Li and Chang, 1998; piecewise linearization, Li and Chang, 1998; Fast Assortment, Li and Tsai, 2001; improved goal programming(Li, 1996); piecewise linearization assortment problem, Li, Chang and Tsai, 2002.
4/3, 4/10: local optima for MINLP, Li,1992; 0-1 fractional, Li, 1994; 0-1 fractional, Chang, 2001; nonconvex separable, Li and Yu, 1999.
4/17 paper presentation
4/24 paper presentation
5/1 paper presentation
5/8, 5/15: Signomial discrete problems (Tsai, 2002); Fractional programming (Tsai, 2005);SDP with Free variable, Tsai and Lin, 2006. 
5/22 Container loading problems (Chen, 1995); Distributed packing, Li, Tsai and Hu, 2003.
5/29 Multiple solutions, Tsai, Lin and Hu, 2008; multiple solutions of nonlinear equation, Tsai and Lin, 2007.
6/5 paper presentation +Game Theory (I)
6/12 paper presentation +Game Theory(II)
6/19 paper presentation +Spectrum Management
scorePolicy:
Presentation: 50% (25% for each) 
上課討論與出席情況: 30% 
Homework: 20%
